verses.roman:
rātre teṅho svapna dekhe,--prabhu āilā ghare
prātaḥ-kāle āsi' rahe grāmera bāhire

synonyms: rātre—at night; teṅho—he (Candraśekhara); svapna—a dream; dekhe—saw; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āilā—has come; ghare—to his home; prātaḥ-kāle—in the morning; āsi'-coming; rahe—he remained; grāmera bāhire—outside the city.
translation: In a dream Candraśekhara had seen that Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu had come to his home; therefore in the morning Candraśekhara went outside the city to receive the Lord.
